alert.note: Alert for Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm and heavy downpours will impact portions of southeastern Windham, southwestern Kent and southwestern Providence Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 830 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Canterbury, or near Plainfield, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Coventry, Windham, Plainfield, Killingly, Scituate, Brooklyn, West Greenwich, Canterbury, Foster, Sterling, Hampton and Scotland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
